name: Bugorant
description:
Load up a game with your mates and shoot each other in 5 rounds of high octane action. Requires 2 or more players to play.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023, check out the page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/bugorant-1

I've been up since 5am, I'm off to bed now... Peace!
